unit.utterance: Avalaš ke yek mazraei bude ke tuyaš mivehāye golābi bud
unit.utterance_translation: At the beginning there was a farm in which there were fruit trees

unit.utterance: bad yek āqāyi bud bāqbān bud dāšt mivehā rā mičid
unit.utterance_translation: then there was a man, a gardner who was picking the fruits

unit.utterance: bad mivehā rā čid golābihā rā āvard pāyin rixt tuye sabad
unit.utterance_translation: he picked the fruits, brought down the pears and put them into the basket

unit.utterance: do tā sabade por bud bā yek sabade xāli
unit.utterance_translation: there were two full baskets and an empty one

unit.utterance: bad yek āqāye digar bā yek heyvāni ke hamrāhaš bud fekr konam yek gāv bud
unit.utterance_translation: then there was another man with an animal, which I think it was a cow

unit.utterance: faqat rad šod bad yek bače ke savāre dočarxe bud āmad piše golābihā yek sabad golābi bardāšt dāšt barmigašt
unit.utterance_translation: he just passed, afterwards there came a kid on a bike, he approached the pears' baskets, took one of them and as he was going

unit.utterance: hamān moqe ke dāšt barmigašt yek dāne bačeye digar ke savāre dočarxe bud az kenāraš rad šod
unit.utterance_translation: he bumped into another kid on a bike
he got distracted and his hat fell off

unit.utterance: va vaqti kolāhaš oftād dočarxeaš barxord kard bā sang oftād zamin
unit.utterance_translation: and when his hat fell, the bike hit a stone and he fell down

unit.utterance: golābihāyaš rixt bad se tā bačeye digar beheš āmadand komak kardand
unit.utterance_translation: the pears spilled out, then three kids came to help him

unit.utterance: azašān tašakor kard va bačehā vaqti dāštand miraftand didand kolāhe dustešān oftāde
unit.utterance_translation: he thanked them and when the kids were leaving, they found out that their friend's hat was left

unit.utterance: barmigardand kolāh rā yekišān beheš midahad
unit.utterance_translation: they returned and one of them went to give the hat to the boy

unit.utterance: va dar avaz se tā golābi azašān migirad
unit.utterance_translation: and in return he got three pears

unit.utterance: bad hamintor ke bāqbān dāšte golābihāyaš rā mičide āmad pāyin *
unit.utterance_translation: and while the gardner was picking the pears, he climbed down

unit.utterance: didaš ke yeki az zarfāye golābihāyaš kam šode
unit.utterance_translation: and found out that one of the baskets was not there

unit.utterance: hamān lahze bačehā rad šodand se tā bačeyi ke be ān dustešān komak kardand rad šodand
unit.utterance_translation: at the same time the three kids who helped their friend crossed over
